text: Este é um exemplo básico que mostra quatro operações básicas: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . can also embed plots, example:  case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
